name: Tesseract (itch) (Fuzzy Pixel)
description:
My commission for GMTK Gamejam 2020.

For this small game I was inspired by the movie The Cube II, where main characters could barely control even the fabric of reality and time they've been in.

I advise to press "fullscreen" button, since the game is controlled by arrow-keys and your browser may react to you pressing them by scrolling the page.

WARNING 18+: The game has blood, gore and violence in it.
